# ConcatenationError.nonUniformShapes(columnName:)

**Case**

A column contains arrays or shaped arrays with non-uniform shapes.

## Declaration

```swift
case nonUniformShapes(columnName: String)
```

## Analyzing the error

- **ConcatenationError.mismatchedShapes**: Shaped arrays across columns have mismatched shapes and can’t be concatenated.
